subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Raphael Matos was racing go-karts in Brazil on the day in 1994 when the three-time Formula One champion Ayrton Senna crashed and died in San Marino.
snippet: Raphael Matos was racing go-karts in Brazil on the day in 1994 when the three-time Formula One champion Ayrton Senna crashed and died in San Marino.
